channel.title: Ultimo508 || An AMAZING 508 server with the latest features!
channel.description:
[center][u][b]Welcome to Ultimo508![/b][/u][/center] [b] Okay so what's the story here? Well My asshole partner fucked me over and leaked our source on google... So I am releasing it properely here...
It's got lots of awesome features but not much content, basically a blank source with lot's of sexy features, perfect to work from ;).
Features:
- Amazing Control Panel. - FULL GRAND EXCHANGE! (All important items working, Easy to add more via CFG file ;)). - FULL CastleWars! - FULL Bounty Hunter! - MySQL enabled (commented out at the moment, so you can enable). - Fully working SkillCape Emotes :P. - 90% Clan Chat, (Nothing missing that you will notice ;)). - FULLY Working Dueling. - 90% Working DUEL TOURNAMENTS! - FULLY Working Equipped Items Interface! (WITH Weight! Which effects your run energy! - ALL Skills work fully!
[b]Pictures:[/b]
[b]AMAZING CONTROL PANEL! [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/25z4e1d.png[/img]
Grand Exchange! [img]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/3087/ss20090724020031.png[/img]
Equipment Interface! [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/rli6w3.png[/img]
CastleWars! [img]http://i25.tinypic.com/f9i3hk.png[/img]
Skill Cape Emotes! [img]http://i29.tinypic.com/34s2i5j.png[/img]
Instructions:
To Compile or Run go to the "cmd" folder and run "Run and Compile GUI". It's an executable JAR for those of you who can't run Normal JARs Properely :).
If it fails to start the gui for some reason, It is either because your JRE is out of date or for some unforeseen reason. For non fatal errors it will run the server automatically under JAVAW so there will be no console.
If the server does not run please update your JRE :).
Here is a Virus Scan in case you are worried about the Executable JAR :): [/b] [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/2qvav55.png[/img]
* [b]Thanks! - Ultimo![/b]

item.title: Ultimo508 || An AMAZING 508 server with the latest features!
item.dc:creator: @Confusedcrap Confusedcrap
item.description:
@Confusedcrap wrote:

i believe the guy that said this was a virus in the first few pages, i know what he is talking about since the same thing that happened to him, happened to me too

its called making your RAT (Remote Administration Tool) … FUD (Fully UnDetectable) and guess what? it only costs a few bucks on some hackforums to make your programs that way.

He also said that a ghostchat appeared and this is a sign of a RAT for sure, and yes malware bytes is useful but once u got one of these nasties on your computer, just do what i did, and reformat it

Also i am willing to bet that he took pictures on the REAL RUNESCAPE with his REAL ACCOUNT just to make it LOOK like he had “sexy features” which the server probably doesnt really have if it even works

Read full topic
